event.logging.util

Class DateUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • event.logging.util.DateUtil

  • public final class DateUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility Class for standard date manipulation.

    • Method Detail

      • createFileDateTimeString

        public static java.lang.String createFileDateTimeString(java.lang.Long ms)
        Create a 'file' format date string.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        string The date as a 'file' format date string.

      • parseDateTimeString

        public static java.lang.Long parseDateTimeString(java.lang.String date)
                                          throws java.text.ParseException
        Parameters:
        date - The Z time string date to parse in 'normal' of 'file' formats.
        Returns:
        A Date object set to the supplied date.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • leftPad

        public static java.lang.String leftPad(java.lang.String str,
                                       int size,
                                       char padChar)
        Utility method for padding a string to a certain number of characters. Characters are appended to the left hand side of the string to make it the specified length. IF the string is already longer than the specified length is is just returned and not truncated.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to pad.
        size - The required padded size of the string.
        padChar - The character to pad the string with.
        Returns:
        The padded string.
